summary.text: Senior Systems Development Engineer with 12+ years of experience building and scaling distributed systems at Amazon and other top tech companies. Expert in cloud infrastructure, DevOps automation, and large-scale migrations. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams, architecting CI/CD platforms supporting 20,000+ pipelines, and driving operational excellence across global infrastructure.

projects.title: PageNotes Live
projects.description: Chrome extension with end-to-end mobile and web integrations enabling users to annotate, save, and organize notes on any webpage. Features real-time sync across devices with a complete mobile companion app.
details: Built cross-platform Chrome Extension with content script injection and background service workers
Implemented real-time data sync using WebSockets with offline-first architecture
Designed responsive mobile companion app with push notification support
Engineered full-stack solution with secure authentication and cloud storage

projects.title: Fine-Tuned AI Models
projects.description: Published two fine-tuned large language models on Hugging Face: Veltha-14B-StoryCraft-v1 for creative story generation, and indian-legal-assistant-aya for Indian legal domain assistance. Contributed to open source AI community.
details: Fine-tuned 14B parameter LLM using LoRA/QLoRA techniques for efficient training
Curated domain-specific datasets for Indian legal corpus and creative writing
Implemented RAG pipelines for improved context-aware model responses
Published models with documentation and inference examples on Hugging Face Hub

projects.title: Self-Hosted Infrastructure
projects.description: Built a complete private home server infrastructure using TrueNAS with RAID configurations. Self-hosted alternatives to cloud services including Supabase (database), Dokploy (deployment platform like Vercel), Gitea (git hosting), and n8n workflows for automated social media content generation and cross-platform automations.
details: Configured RAID arrays for data redundancy and high-availability storage
Deployed containerized services using Docker Compose with reverse proxy routing
Built n8n automation workflows for AI-powered social media content generation
Set up CI/CD pipelines with self-hosted Gitea and Dokploy for zero-cost deployments

experience.title: Senior Systems Development Engineer
responsibilities: Designed and built the DCPG Agent Infrastructure from the ground up, including an integrated permission system and ticketing capabilities; managed the complete SDLC from architecture to deployment, cutting manual effort by up to 90%
Architected a large-scale migration platform to transition Amazon's global infrastructure from legacy to modern AWS Load Balancers, improving reliability and scalability across the organization
Designed and supported 20,000+ CI/CD pipelines powering 100,000+ environments and managing 500,000+ load balancers, ensuring zero-downtime cutovers
Led cross-functional collaboration for implementing SMART bid templates, improving customer productivity by 50% and removing legacy platform overhead
Championed best practices in distributed systems and DevOps, enabling accelerated service migrations while maintaining compliance and security

experience.title: Systems Development Engineer
responsibilities: Collaborated with cross-organizational teams to define architectural standards and automate migration workflows
Implemented monitoring and alerting systems to ensure resilience at scale
Prepared technical presentations for internal and client project engineering review
Developed detailed technical documentation to support product launches and production transitions

experience.title: Software Development Engineer III
responsibilities: Developed reusable code libraries reducing time-to-market for new features
Mentored junior developers on best practices, coding techniques, and problem-solving skills
Built automation solutions for 20+ categories to streamline multi-channel communication
Reduced technical debt by refactoring legacy code for improved maintainability

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
responsibilities: Automated manual tasks through Python and Shell scripting, boosting team productivity
Designed and implemented containerization strategies using Docker and Kubernetes
Managed both NoSQL and SQL database systems, ensuring scalable data architecture
Deployed infrastructure updates with zero-downtime strategies and CI/CD workflows

experience.title: Support Engineer
experience.company: Bank Of New York Mellon Corp
responsibilities: Provided technical support for enterprise systems, minimizing downtime
Investigated and documented security procedure violations, ensuring compliance
Monitored daily system performance, proactively resolving technical faults

experience.title: Support Engineer
responsibilities: Installed and repaired hardware, software, and peripheral systems per organizational specs
Evaluated IT infrastructure and recommended performance enhancements
Coordinated with vendors to resolve major technical issues, reducing system outages

education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology & Science, Pilani, India
